Waitematā DHB: Elderly man dies after failures in North Shore Hospital discharge process https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/waitemata-dhb-elderly-man-dies-after-failures-in-north-shore-hospital-discharge-process/62SYAUOKWVBV3FJ54PCW64MS3A/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/waitemata-dhb-elderly-man-dies-after-failures-in-north-shore-hospital-discharge-process/62SYAUOKWVBV3FJ54PCW64MS3A/ Tracy NealThe much-loved husband and father was rushed back to hospital but died there. Mon, 11 Nov 2024 01:00:00 +0000 The HDC found there was no formal assessment of the man’s need for home oxygen before he was discharged from North Shore Hospital, where he later died after being re-admitted. Photo / 123RF
